ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISPICKVAL( Type , "1-Step Distributor"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "2-Step Distributor"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Lumberyard"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Modular Home Builder") ) && $User.ProfileId = "00ec0000000E8wf" && ISCHANGED( OwnerId )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please contact Management or an Administrator to change the owner of this Account.
